snippet.title: Lupin Sansei: Cagliostro no Shiro (ルパン三世 カリオストロの城) for the NEC PC-88
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

FM-7


Game description:

Lupin Sansei: Cagliostro no Shiro is a first-person dungeon crawler RPG based on the movie of the same name (known in English-speaking countries as "Lupin the Third: Castle of Cagliostro").

Players can choose from Lupine, Jigen, Goemon, and Zenigata, and their goal is to walk around the castle of Cagliostro and meet Fujiko, but it
starts at 8 pm and closes by 12 pm. (Time elapses little by little each time you do something.) 
Since the initial parameters are quite different for each character, it seems that the way the game progresses will change considerably.
